name: Exploding UVs
description:
Use your 2D Fists to fight the unending horde that are 3D Models!

Exploding UVs is a 2-Day game made by myself using a random game generated by https://orteil.dashnet.org/gamegen

“An experimental game where you stop breathing if you don't destroy 3D Models- but like, it's totally aesthetic"

          * There Are 4 Skins to unlock *

Thank You For Playing!
